title: Nokia 109 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD 4K LED Smart Android TV with Sound by JBL and Powered by Harman AudioEFX  (43UHDADNDT52X)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, User Manual, Mini AV Cable, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 TV Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, Wallmount Stand, 4 Wallmount Stand Screws, Power Cord
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, AVI, TS, MOV, MKV, DAT, MP4, VOB
product_specification.Sound Technology: Sound by JBL | Harman AudioEFX | Dolby Atmos | 60W Sound power | Integrated high end bass reflex tube
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Netflix, Prime, Disney+hotstar, Zee5, Voot, Spotify, SonyLiv, YouTube, Google Suite of Apps and Others Downloadable from Playstore etc.
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Latest Android 11, Google Assistant, Chromecast Built-in, Google Home, Compatible with Gamepad
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant with Netflix, Prime Video and YouTube Hotkeys, Minimalistic Design
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship. Parts and Labour Costs are Covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag, plastic parts), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups, Panel damages caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Sound by JBL: Experience stellar audio with the technologically advanced sound architect-designed and curated by JBL. Through Dynamic amplification technology, it captures the energy and dynamism contained in an audio signal, reproducing it without any quality loss. Experience crystal clear sound characteristics with zero feedback and minimal distortions along with up to 150% more sound clarity.
product_description.Powered by Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos: Dolby Vision HDR transforms your TV experience with ultra-vivid picture that brings entertainment to life. Dolby Atmos creates powerful, moving audio that seems to flow all around you.

review:

But if you want to see the vivid colours please don't buy.

Boasts big, but deliver less.

Had ordered the TV on launch date with great expectations.

Pros :-
1) Picture Quality is fine. High brightness
2) Audio is just fine not very great.
3) Delivery happened soon, that is before time
4) Packaging etc were fine

Cons :-
1) No much quick control options through remote. for Picture settings, Sound settings etc, we need to go through the menu which is not feasible everytime.
2) Audio is good, but comes with a Huge down facing sound bar, which occupies a lots of space.
3) The TV projects almost 15-20 cms from the wall
4) Surround options are not effective because of sound bar placement.
5) had to make a couple of followups for installation and as usual Jeeves is not reachable.
6) However installation happened on the promised date, and the person who came for installation looked very tired.
He wanted to finish off the setup soon to move to next customer, may be the company has put a lot of load on them.
7) Andriod 11 doesnt seem to make much difference.
8) Have to add the bluetooth option for remote everytime we power on
9) Could have provided an mobile App, to manage TV, which most TVs has nowadays.
10) Plastic Build, doesnt seem to be strong.

Overall, not a great option but just does the job.

Thanks to useless Flipkart Customer support.
Overall good tv value for money best class sound quality amazing pictures quality great work Nokia best thing about this TV made in india.😊

Received TV on 7 Oct but the instalation was scheduled on 14 Oct, after so much follow up I got instalation on 13 Oct, Over all TV is good , good picture quality, sound and taking some time to on. over all good
When power on.. that talking so much time..

My 4k led 43 inch TV delivery date will be oct 17, I have requested to flipkart support team to arrange delivery slot as earliest as. I am very happy to mention here I have received 4 days before my delivery date,

I really appreciate it his delivery and support!

Keep it up!

Undoubtedly a very good decision for this purchase. Wonderful, decent look. Picture quality not so good for SD but fabulous for HD and 4K. And the more than paisa wasool for sound. Just wooow...! Crystal clear. Difference of sound delivering from speakers and tweeters are quite remarkable. Dolby ATMOS is absolutely mind blowing. Feeling the every dimension of sound as intended. Wifi connectivity is good.

Some downs..
Startup delay.
Response time of any action is a bit delayed. (Any function you press it on remote will take a pause before it appears on screen)
SD upscaling in not good or I would say it poor. (But anyways this kind of TVs are not intended to be focused on SD's)

If you are a Bass lover, there is always an option for additional home theatre or sound bar.
But the actual requirement for this TV is only an additional ideal woofer only(without any speakers or sound bar) from brands like Sony or JBL but this kind of customized requirements are not possible.

But anyways..! Loved it. Go for it.

If you plan to buy a new android TV with all smart features then this Nokia JBL 2021 tv is the best option.
The sound is awesome; Connectivity, Picture quality, Build quality, Design are also the best at this price.🔥🔥🔥
Good work NOKIA and FLIPKART team👌👍
Best tv I have received very happy superb sound and picture is so crisp and natural colour.

Absolutely one of the best TV.
Sound quality is super you don’t require external speakers.
Picture quality is awsome. 4k video clarity is superb.
Overall its a gud deal.

Ohh thank God and thank you flipkart for the big billion day deal. With the deal I got the 55 inches for 39999
Review based on the usage after one week. Best in Class.

Pros

On Product
-----------------
1. Brightness. Extraordinary brightness with 400 nits
2. Excellent Audio quality. No need of buying sound bar. Hats off to Nokia for choosing JBL speakers.
3. Upscaling normal (even SD contents) video contents.
4. Sleek and smart remote. Can be operable on both IR and Bluetooth.

On Flipkart:
-------------------
1. Great deals
• 2000 instant deduction for flipkart plus members against 200 coins
• 3000 SBI card deal
• 1500 offer on no cost EMI.
• Got the excellent bigger screen TV at final price 39499
2. Excellent delivery on next day as committed.
3. Perfect on time installation by technician from Jeeves.
4. Technician has clearly explained about the product features, operation and warrenty

Cons :
1. Bit lagging on audio video synchronization
2. Could have improved more on the color saturation.
3. Taking more time on booting after power on.
4. Android home screen is bit irritating whenever booting. We need to choose the input channel manually every time whenever boots.
5. Could have provisioned far field mic for voice assistant similar to Mi/xiami and oneplus.
6. I cant get the sound from tv speakers, if connected external speakers with 3.5mm audio jack unless manually disconnect the audio jack.
Good sound qualify connectivity is good everything is good I liked.

I have been using Nokia 43 inch sound by JBL and Powered by Harman AudioEFX (43UHDADNDT52X) TV for last 9 days.
Picture quality is Superb, no over saturation of colors. Colors are very natural. Blacks are perfect. no need of any casting devices like firestick. Dolby vision & 4k video's runs effortlessly with great picture quality.
Sound is awesome no need for additional sound bar. Sound is very clear even at low levels. For a room size of 14 /14 Feet you will never require to increase volume more than 45%.

I purchased Nokia Tv after returning VU Premium Ultra HD TV twice. both the times i had issue with night or very dark scenes.
VU premium Tv was displaying those black scenes as patchy spots. In Nokia TV very dark scenes run flawlessly .

Service provided by Flipkart was excellent , they replaced the VU Premium Ultra HD TV initially and when issue still persisted they refunded the money.
Jeeves also provided excellent & timely service on installation. . I even took extended warranty from them. My previous VU 55 inch TV had mother board issue and extended warrant helped me replace it without any cost.

In my view the best UHD LED TV in this price band. Perfectness in terms of sound and display content. No other brand can provide you this sound experience. TV means TV never consider it a subwoofer based music system. I am bass lover and I have other systems for that. I have purchased this 43 inch Nokia tv in addition to 50 inch of same UHD TV within 2 months. You can understand that faith. I am satisfied with both the Nokia TVs.

Best in quality
Audio quality is good not soo good
Picture quality is awesome 350 nits 😍
Best i buy this product rs. 30999

1. Picture Quality is good for the price point
2. Sound is amazing , lot of fun if you like to enjoy loud cinematic experience. Prefer to use it on stand than wall mount as the JBL speakers are down firing and give better response while on stand , for wall mount cannot for onkyo version of same which has fron firing speakers.
Over all a very good experience.

Review of Nokia 50 inch Ultra HD 4K LED Smart TV after using one week. This is a value for money product. Overall experience is very good. Highly recommended and giving review in points to make it easy.

1. Do not compare with premium products ( Sony, Samsung or LG). Understand it is a value for money product.

2. Picture is very good with good brightness and sharp colors. I think best in its price range. Much better than Chinese. Again do not compare with premium products and against rest it is the best .

3. In picture I liked eye protect plus feature. Most features work as claimed and not for namesake. This tv also enhances the picture quality which is also very impressive. Play any low quality video and this tv will enhance its picture quality. Very Nice.

4. Sound by JBL is very impressive. So many people complaining about low sound. I would like to tell them that loud is not good at all. Clear is what matters. Buy any Bose sound system and see how loud it is. It is not loud but clear which is how it should be. Also at this price JBL will provide a basic set up not a higher end setup. Sound is enough and no need to add extra speakers for most. We buy TV for picture, not for its sound. If u get decent sound than it is better which is how it is.

5. Buy it's Qled model if you can spend 10k more. Qled picture is better than this one and this is the only difference between these models.

6. Dual band wifi is a charm. No buffering if you have a decent net speed. Mine is around 50 Mbps. If you connect tv with wired net connection instead of wifi, it will be much better. Recommended for people with low net speed.

7. I could not find much to complain. We need to attach remote with tv by bluetooth every time you start it. This is one major flaw In my view. If you will not add via bluetooth, you need to use the remote directing towards tv. By bluetooth it will work in all directions inside the range. Not a deal breaker at all.

8. A little bit lag but nothing major.

9. Google Assistant work smoothly but again will depend on your net speed.

10. One feature I loved is you can activate auto sound adjustment. Once you activate it, tv will automatically adjust sound on all channels. No need to adjust sound again if you change the channel or if any ad. Comes in between.

11. Design is vey good and it looks premium.

Thanks for reading a long review. I hope my review will help you guys in selecting your tv.

4) Don't think before ordering it, jus go for it!

Pros:
1) Stock/Pure Android OS - Very much a delight for stock android lovers.
2) Strong build - Plastic body and Aluminium Tabketop stand.
3) TV comes with a free simple wall mountable stand and a very short RCA cable
4) Very prompt and quick "next day" TV installation. Jeeves's takes care of the Authorized service support for Nokia(along with many others). They seem to know what they are doing.
5) Vibrant display - compared with Samsung/OnePlus, Motorola, Mi abd VU TV, this is a very good option. Dolby vision available.
6) Great and crystal clear Audio - You've downfiring Harmon speakers - Wofer as well as Tweeter set and JBL Sound along with Dolby Atmos!
7) Data saver is automatic - No seperate option available.
8) A simple remote(be careful it costs 2.5K it lost) with 4 hot keys.
9) Very quick casting from Laptop, Mobile or Tablet.


Cons:
1) You gotta take the complete protection plan from Jeeves if you want to ensure/insure the TV. This is a Pro, but for a first tim buyer, it seems costly - alost 4000/-, but very much worth it. Everyone knows - Smart TVs dont literally last the same as non-Smart TV. So blindly take this full protection plan from Jeeves(who is the ASP for Nokia).
2) The startup is slow - takes about a minute or two - well your nokia TV is just a big gigantic android phone - so this is fine ;)

After using for around a month i would say "sound is the best you can get in this price range. Picture quality could be improved but not bad with the price segment. Have good handy features like only sound mode, using the tv as a Bluetooth speaker are some of the really good features, games like Beach buggy racing, real racing works just fine. Controller connectivity is awesome, not enough points to complain about"

Lastly one thing i would like to say if you are planning to wall mount, then the one with Onkyo soundbar will be better as it has front firing speakers and can give you dolby atmos feel. If you are planning to keep it on stand, then go for the JBL one.

Happy shopping 🛍 ☺️
